SRM
Class Coord

java.lang.Object
  SRM.Coord
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Coord2D, Coord3D, CoordSurf
public abstract class Coord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

The Coord abstract class is the base class for all coordinate types. Coordinates can be allocated on the stack, by using "new", or by using the SRF class methods.

See Also:
Coord2D, Coord3D

public BaseSRF getSRF()
Returns the SRF this coordassocSRFinate belongs to.

getValues

public abstract double[] getValues()
Returns an array containing the coordinate component values. The returned array is of size 2 for 2D and surface, and size 3 for 3D

Returns the class type of this coordinate.
